Use when optimizing website content, improving search rankings, conducting keyword analysis, or implementing SEO best practices. Expert in on-page SEO, meta tags, schema markup, and Core Web Vitals.

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown guidance for SEO optimization. No executable code, no file system access, no network calls, no environment variables. This is informational content only.

content.value_statement: Poor search visibility limits organic traffic and growth. This skill provides comprehensive guidance on keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and Core Web Vitals to improve search rankings and drive organic traffic.
actual_capabilities: Conduct keyword research and analyze search intent
Optimize title tags and meta descriptions for better CTR
Implement structured data and schema markup
Improve Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
Audit websites for technical SEO issues
Create SEO-friendly content structure and internal linking
limitations: Does not access external SEO tools or APIs directly
Cannot modify live websites without explicit user instruction
Provides guidance only; actual implementation requires user action

use_cases.title: Create SEO-friendly content
use_cases.description: Optimize blog posts and articles for search engines while maintaining readability and user value.

use_cases.title: Implement technical SEO
use_cases.description: Add schema markup, optimize Core Web Vitals, and fix technical issues that hurt search rankings.

use_cases.title: Develop SEO strategy
use_cases.description: Research keywords, plan content clusters, and build a comprehensive organic search strategy.

prompt_templates.title: Basic content check
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this content for SEO optimization. Check the title tag, meta description, heading structure, keyword usage, and internal linking. Suggest specific improvements.

prompt_templates.title: Keyword research
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me identify primary and secondary keywords for a page about [TOPIC]. Consider search intent, competition, and content opportunities.

prompt_templates.title: Technical audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a technical SEO audit for a page at [URL]. Check Core Web Vitals, schema markup, URL structure, mobile-friendliness, and indexing status.

prompt_templates.title: Content strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a topic cluster strategy for [MAIN TOPIC]. Identify the pillar page topic, supporting cluster articles, keyword mapping, and internal linking structure.

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all AI coding tools?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Prompt templates are compatible with any LLM-based assistant.

faq.question: What search volume should I target for keywords?
faq.answer: Balance search volume with competition. Start with long-tail keywords (lower volume, easier ranking) and expand to broader terms.

faq.question: How do I integrate SEO guidance into my workflow?
faq.answer: Use the skill during content planning, before publishing, or during regular site audits. Request specific optimizations for individual pages.

faq.question: Does this skill store or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill with no file access, network calls, or data storage. All analysis happens in conversation.

faq.question: What are reasonable Core Web Vitals targets?
faq.answer: LCP under 2.5 seconds, FID under 100ms, and CLS under 0.1. Page speed under 3 seconds load time is a good baseline.

faq.question: How does this compare to automated SEO tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides strategic guidance and best practices. Automated tools like Ahrefs or SEMrush provide data. Use both together.
